c114c92b-0671-453b-bfc6-21ed2223f048.name: CMGT_EXT_API_WriteStudioFields
c114c92b-0671-453b-bfc6-21ed2223f048.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!data: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_fromJson_v1"(http!request.body),
  local!incomingCase: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_studio_recordFromJson"(json: local!data.case),
  local!studioRecord: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(local!data.studioData),
    null,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_studio_recordFromJson"(json: local!data.studioData)
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_studio_writeStudioRecords"(
    studioRecord: local!studioRecord,
    applicationRecord: local!incomingCase,
    onSuccess: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_httpResponse_v1"(statusCode: 200, body: "SUCCESS")
  )
)
